author: PFCal-dev
body:
#### PR description:

Complete review of the VFE code. The most notable changes are:
- Addition of LSB truncation before the floating point compression
- Propagation of recent reco calibration changes in our calibration (updated thickness response equalization, charge collection efficiency correction)
- Code cleaning and a bit of reorganization (hopefully improving the readability) 

#### PR validation:
- Code checks and code format
- Tested workflows: 23234, 27034, 28234
- Checked impact on energy reconstruction of single particles: negligible
title: [HGC trigger] Review of the front-end code
